sentences.en: Ask for a refund if the goods are faulty.
sentences.cn: 商品如有缺陷，可要求退款。

sentences.en: Dissatisfied customers can return the product for a full refund.
sentences.cn: 顾客如不满意可以全额退货。

sentences.en: He said that he needed to get his supervisor to authorize my refund.
sentences.cn: 他说必须让主管人员批准我的退款.

sentences.en: I still think it's a bit of a cheek sending a voucher rather than a refund.
sentences.cn: 我还是认为，他们寄来优惠购物券，而不是退款，真是有些厚颜无耻。

sentences.en: I took the radio back, and they refunded my money .
sentences.cn: 我把收音机送回去，他们给我退了款。

sentences.en: If the warranty is limited, the terms may entitle you to a replacement or refund.
sentences.cn: 如果保修有限制，根据条款你也许可以要求退换或者退款。

sentences.en: It will come as a rude shock when their salary or income-tax refund cannot be cashed.
sentences.cn: 如果他们的工资或所得税返还不能兑现，这对他们来说将是晴天霹雳。

sentences.en: Return your purchase within 14 days for a full refund .
sentences.cn: 14 天之内退货可以全额退款。

sentences.en: The bank has agreed to give an immediate refund in the unlikely event of an error being made.
sentences.cn: 万一出现错误——虽然这种几率微乎其微，银行同意立即退款。

sentences.en: The insurance company will refund any amount due to you.
sentences.cn: 保险公司将退还你应得的所有款项。

sentences.en: They demand a refund on unsatisfactory goods.
sentences.cn: 他们对不满意的货品要求退款.

sentences.en: They refused to give me a refund .
We claimed a refund from the association, but they would not pay up.
sentences.cn: 我们要求该协会退款，但是他们不肯付钱。

sentences.en: We guarantee to refund your money if you are not delighted with your purchase.
sentences.cn: 若您对所购商品不满意，我们保证退款。

sentences.en: We guarantee to refund your money if you're not delighted with your purchase.
sentences.cn: 我们承诺如果您对所买物品不满意可以退款。

sentences.en: We will gladly exchange your goods, or refund your money, whichever you prefer.
sentences.cn: 我们将很乐意为您换货或退款，看您更愿意怎么做。

sentences.en: We'll refund your money if you aren't satisfied.
sentences.cn: 你若不满意,我们愿意退款给你.

sentences.en: When I didn't hear from the suppliers or receive a refund, I chased the matter up.
sentences.cn: 我既没收到供货商的消息，也没拿到退款，于是开始追查此事。

sentences.en: You should go down there and demand a refund.
sentences.cn: 你应该到那里去，要求退款。

words.tran_cn: 退款；[金融]偿还，[会计]偿还额

trans.tran_en: an amount of money that is given back to you if you are not satisfied with the goods or services that you have paid for
to give someone their money back, especially because they are not satisfied with the goods or services they have paid for
to give someone their money back, especially because they are not satisfied with the goods or services they have paid for
